name: Trials Extreme 4x4 Forever
description:
Trials Extreme 4x4 Forever is a physics engine auto game in the open world.
Player drives an mountains along with fully load trailers through difficult roads. To complete a missions player is required to have true 4x4 off-road driving skills. Game architecture is designed on real-time physics engine.

Enjoy the fun of controlling a crazy Four-wheel offroad Racing!
Race on high detailed tracks! This game is for all extreme sport enthusiasts including fans jeeps, trucks, 4 wheelers!

FEATURES
* Easy controller
* 4x4 off-road driving skills
* Beautiful Graphics
* "Sandbox" game
* Realistic 4x4 physics
* Every machine is individual - various characteristics of all the machines: such as handling, acceleration, suspension!
